newsitem.title: MACEDONIA: MACEDONIA STOCK VOLUME, TURNOVER FALLS.
newsitem.headline: MACEDONIA STOCK VOLUME, TURNOVER FALLS.

text.p: Turnover fell to 2,700 denars at Thursday's session of the Macedonian stock exchange from 37,650 denars on Tuesday as only one company traded, the exchange said.
Oteks Ohrid sold 18 shares at 150 denars, unchanged from the previous close and below par of 1,941 denars.
Traded volume was 89 shares at the previous session on Tuesday.
Listed companies trade in two floor sessions. The exchange trades on Tuesday and Thursday.
